decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of creatures with unique abilities to assemble combos and control the game. By tutoring for specific creatures with Chord of Calling, the player can create powerful synergies, using cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Grist, the Hunger Tide to generate value and resources. Delighted Halfling and Wall of Roots provide early game presence, while Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Endurance offer powerful late-game threats. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a versatile toolbox of creatures while maintaining control of the board through efficient interactions.

This deck focuses on quickly and efficiently filling the graveyard with powerful creatures while disrupting the opponent's game plan. By using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Tainted Indulgence, the deck can cheat out creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, gaining a huge advantage in a short amount of time. With access to a variety of removal spells and disruptive cards like Grief and Solitude, the deck can control the game until it can assemble its combo pieces for a quick win. Additionally, the deck includes ways to protect its game plan with cards like Force of Negation and Ephemerate.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using equipment like Colossus Hammer and Kaldra Compleat to quickly deal massive amounts of damage. By utilizing Puresteel Paladin and Stoneforge Mystic to tutor for and equip these powerful cards, alongside cards like Esper Sentinel to disrupt opponents and protect your combo pieces, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents with a deadly combination of equipment and creatures. Urza's Saga and Forge Anew provide additional ways to search for key pieces, making this deck a fast and threatening force in Modern 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of disruption and efficient threats. By utilizing a streamlined mana base and key cards like Tarmogoyf, Ragavan, and Wrenn and Six, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional value and flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to quickly take control of the game and maintain pressure through a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on disrupting opponents with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Grief, while also utilizing aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Troll of Khazad-dm to quickly deal damage and pressure the opponent. Liliana of the Veil provides additional disruption and control, while cards like Not Dead After All and Persist allow for resilience and recursion. The deck also includes a few higher-cost creatures like Trumpeting Carnosaur and Inti, Seneschal of the Sun for added versatility. Overall, this deck aims to apply consistent pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck revolves around utilizing The Underworld Cookbook to quickly fill your graveyard with creatures and artifacts, allowing you to bring back powerful creatures like Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar and Ovalchase Daredevil. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells like Lightning Bolt and Insidious Roots, the deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with early pressure and graveyard recursion. The inclusion of Urza's Saga helps generate additional value while providing a versatile toolbox of artifacts to support your game plan. Overall, the deck aims to be fast, resilient, and disruptive to secure victories in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.
